meanings.definition: Stored or preserved in an archive.
meanings.sent1: The old documents were archived for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: The archived photos brought back memories of the past.
meanings.sent3: The archived files decided to have a reunion in the dusty storage room.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an archived library, full of forgotten stories waiting to be rediscovered.
meanings.sent5: The archived treasures gleamed with the patina of time, waiting to be uncovered.

meanings.definition: To place or store in an archive.
meanings.sent1: She archived the important emails in a separate folder.
meanings.sent2: The librarian archived the historical documents with care.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to archive its acorns in the hollow tree.
meanings.sent4: His memories were archived in the depths of his mind, waiting to be revisited.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologist archived the ancient artifacts, preserving them for future generations.
